meanings.definition: A unit of capacity equal to one thousandth of a liter.
meanings.sent1: I poured one milliliter of water into the tiny cup.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for adding 50 milliliters of milk to the batter.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant asked for a milliliter of sugar for its tea party.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like a milliliter of sweetness in a sea of bitterness.
meanings.sent5: The scientist carefully measured each milliliter of the solution for accuracy.
